attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: call on the government to reform council tax. Under this plan, one adult in a property would only pay 50% of the tax instead of 75%, a couple would pay 100%, three or more adults would pay 150%.  It combines the best of the council tax, where the property value usually has at least some resemblance to a person's ability to pay, with the poll tax idea that the more people there are, the more is to be paid

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
